caption: Great pizza, convenient, easy, neighborhood staple!
I'm originally a NYer and wanted an authentic NY pie. I didn't know if Corner Slice would live up to my expectations but the did!  Totally going back!
New York style pizza...giant pizza..cooked right..thin crust...delish!!!

I nearly wept for joy as I ate this pizza, which brought back memories of innumerable New York style slices consumed over the years. I've lived in the DC area for years and passed this place so many times. So many missed opportunities! The signage doesn't scream "NY style pizza" but I am here to tell you, the pizza DOES!!! Look no further, former tri-state area people, this is your place. THANK YOU!! What have I been doing at these overpriced, fussy, personal-sized pizza places? Looking for home in the wrong places and not finding it, that's what. Well the search is over and I'm home, with the huge, thin pies from Corner Slice!

Great Pizza, Ordered from here after some hit or miss pizzas from Mama Lucias. Some Notes:  1) Good NY style Pizza (I grew up in NY) 2) Perfect Sauce to cheese ratio 3) Perfect Melt, could tell as soon as I opened the box 4) Crust Perfect around edges (mild blackening) 5) Underside cooked perfectly 6) THEY DELIVER, did not need to use an APP
Great pizza!! NY style fresh and delicious!! I would eat it all the time if I could!!
Good pizza.  Worth trying out.
Good, greasy pizza
I love it its so good
Big on quantity, bad on quality
For kids the large plain cheese is hard to beat.  Better than your chain pizza joints and large enough to feed a crowd.

Walked in for a quick bite to hold over my hunger until dinner - bought one slice, liked it so much, walked back in to get another. Crispy on the bottom and cheesy on top. Good flavor, reminds me of good street pizza in NYC.
The best Pizza in the area and a great value.
Best nyc style pizza in the dmv. The pizza is cheap, and delicious. And the vibes in the restaurant are super vintage. Love it.

Best pizza around no doubt. My friends and I have been going here for the past 5 years. The owner is always friendly and the store has a great vibe not to mention they have great pizza... would highly recommend.

Horrible customer service. Do not order online it is a scam. When you press to order through the website it takes you to a page that no one working in Corner Slice knows about. They now have my credit card info. When I called on the phone the person taking orders told me to wait and proceeded to yell at his friend, then he came back and started yelling at me. Do not order. Stole my money and got yelled at.
Best pizza in Bethesda!!!
Neighborhood staple! Prices, sizes and stimulating conversations!
The ONLY real NY style pizza in the DMV. I've been coming here for at least 15 years and I still live their Pizza. You can buy just a slice or have a pie freshly made, either way it's fantastic.
Great pizza. Would go again.
Best pizza around

If you Love NY style Pizza, you will have to checkout this place. Be ready and bring your friends because their pizza is huge. Two person is possible to finish one pizza but both person have to be very hungry. Get a plain cheese pizza, I promise you will be amazed. Fresh made pizza is always worth it for the wait time I promise.
Best NY pizza this side of NY. Huge slices, and friendly staff. Not a huge place, so eat-in may be standing. I plan on this pizza every time I am in the area!
Real NYC style pizza.
Melty cheese and crunchy crust
Best pizza in Bethesda!
The owners/manager makes you feel very unwelcome in the shop.  Pizza is good, but customer service so so.
Best pizza in the dc area
Best slice of spinach-artichoke pizza around!
Amazing NY style pizza by the slice.
Reminds me of Pizza from Home(NY)!! Delicious!
Great NY style pizza
Pizza is good
I wish i could give them zero stars.  The owners/manager makes you feel very uncomfortable and unwelcome in the shop.  Pizza is so so but I would avoid

Either racists or just blatantly ignorant. I’m a college student that tried to get the STUDENT special and online it says $5  but In store says $6 (clearly someone needs to update their website ) either way the older man (owner maybe?) said it’s for high school students (Lol) when I have friends who’ve gotten it and both online and in store just says “students “ and doesn’t specify. I didn’t even argue or try to show id. I just got the $8 special and the pizza was 80% oil 10% crust 5% cheese and the last 5% sauce. You’re better off going to Domino’s on the next block. I wish I would’ve left when he lied and told me it was just high school students but I still tried it and was let down again by the restaurant. Take your dollar elsewhere! Wish I could give 0 stars.
Pizza was ok, nothing spectacular
Closest thing to real NY pizza I have found in the DC area.
QUick, cheap, and perfect for sudden pizza cravings! My only qualm is that it would be nice if the bottoms of the slices weren't so consistently burned...
Love the 🍕, love the owner.
Awesome 👍 pizza best in Bethesda
Big slices for cheap, with  friendly workers
A very good pizza.
Nice thin crust, though it tends to be greasy in the middle.
Great taste
Ok so i dont eat pizza but i LOVE thos spot!! Best Pizza in Bethesda hands down!! 2 thumbs up!! Come vist my Spa!! ❤
some of the best pizza in Bethesda!
I love this place. The pizza is consistently good every single time. They have such good and fresh ingredients with lots cheeses and veggies, etc.
Decent pizza.
Really good people and a really good NY style slice.
Best Pizza in Maryland!
The service is always amazing and the food meets all expectations. Great experience and the food is great. I ordered for 5 and my friends like it too. I will definetly order again

This place is the quintessential New York style pizza place in downtown Bethesda. Just the right thickness on the dough and crust, perfect  tomato sauce (just a bit sweet and salty), and the right amount of cheese. Even the grease from the cheese was perfectly proportioned. I ordered the 2 slices of cheese and a soda for $8 and it was the right amount of food. I would say my only gripe is the difference in price points, a slice of cheese is $3.50 and a whole pizza is $18.95 (20 Inch) and at Vace in Bethesda I could get a slice for $2.50 and whole pizza for $11.00 (16 inch) and the quality of both places is the same. So I would say this won’t be my only trip to Corner Slice, but more than likely my next trip will only be made out of convenience.

The locale may need improving but you come for their outstanding NYC style pizza. Great crust, balanced tomato sauce, decent cheese. Toppings are OK and abundant. Best value in Bethesda. It's best to enjoy your pizza right out of the oven - not the same once you get it home but reheats well.
Hands down best pizza in town.

Found out about this place 2 years ago and haven’t stopped going since. Best NY style pizza in Bethesda by far. The crust is perfectly crunchy, sauce with just the right amount of tang, mixed with a perfect amount of cheese. 10/10 would recommend

Not the best pizza, but definitely a solid choice. Best to eat there, when the crust is still firm. Even better to get slices, warmed in the oven while you wait. Otherwise, whenever we get it delivered, the crust gets moist (from being in the pizza box) and chewy.
Best pizza in the area hands down.
Best pizza in the area! Perfect crust and delicious sauce cooked to perfection. I don't go anywhere else.
Good pizza
Great Pizza, but never open on time.
good-sized large slices and a gr8 drink selection for reasonable prices. Bethesda icon.
Very authentic NY slice of pizza. Go to place for REAL pizza!! :)
Best NY style pizza in the area!
Yummy NY style pizza
Pretty decent pizza
Excellent pizza!
Owner needs to learn to hush his mouth when it comes to LGBT issues
Pizza 4 Star Price 2 Star  Would be 3 Star  But guy at counter complained distastefully about an ex employee out loud  2 Star!
The 🍕 was gigantic and absolutely delicious! I would recommend Corner Slice to anyone looking for awesome New York style 🍕

The reviewer on here who said that The Corner Slice has cockroaches and that the owner is unfit to run a business must be from another universe--or is simply unfit to write a review.  The Corner Slice is a great place to grab a slice or two of New York-style pizza (or a whole pie). The staff is friendly and helpful. I highly recommend it.
Love me a couple pepperoni slices at lunch!
Great NY style pizza
Owner is not fit to run a business. Foods greasy and place has roaches.
Very comfortable atmosphere! And of course, delicious pizza. I would pick this over the chain stores any day.

You can't go wrong with getting a carry-out cheese pizza from Corner Slice. I've had 2Amys, I've had Pete's Pizza, I've had All-Purpose and this is simply better. It's the Platonic form of pizza; crust with the right amount of chew, oozing cheese, sweet marinara with a touch of acidity, HUGE slices. This is the pizza of the gods, verily I say unto you. The only issue is Bethesda parking, so find a spot you can camp out in while a friend runs in to grab the food. And don't let them forget to sprinkle on the extra oregano!
Great NY style pizza

I am from Brooklyn, grew up on new York pizza,  and was looking forward to a good N.Y. pizza experience based on the reviews here.  I was terribly disappointed.  Soggy crust and not enough cheese.  Ill keep looking for good pizza.  It was not here.
Best pizza by the slice in Bethesda

username: Thanks for Trump CNN, MSNBC and Hillary

caption: This is New York style pizza. I love to grab a piece fold it in half like my father (who was from NYC) taught me and shove the cheesy goodness in to my mouth. It seems a lot of people think papa johns is the measure of all pizza and that's sad. Long live Corner Slice!
Pizza had no flavor tasted like a cardboard box
Good pizza and good toppings.  The large pizzas are very big.

Terrible, terrible pizza.  Bland crust, tasteless cheese, and I had to look at the pizza to tell if there was really pepperoni on there like I'd ordered.  Pizza Hut would be better, cause at least that has flavor.  And $4 for a slice!
I've had pizza in Italy, New York, Chicago, and every other place that serves pizza, and corner slice is the best. I don't know why, i just know that its the best pizza that I've ever eaten.
Great pizza, without a doubt.

What I really like about the Corner Slice is the owner and staff truly values customer feedback. They know that everybody likes their pizza differently and they really want to do it right for you, so just let them know if you're ordering for the first time. I'll stop by for a giant slice or grab an order for a movie night with some friends. There's nothing like feeling totally satisfied with your pals. Also, if you're active duty, retired, or a family member, call for the military Monday carry out only deal. They're also open for special events such as Superbowl Sundays.
Best slice of pizza in Bethesda and great friendly service this is where  New Yorkers come for a great slice of pie.
Great place to get a slice
Cornet Slice is great!
(Translated by Google) 8slicesveribig  (Original) 8slicesveribig
So thin
Hands down, the best pizza in the DC area. Hands down, drop the mike, excellent.
Good flavor, smaller then expected for the price.
Corner Slice is always good for a fast slice of pizza on the go. Located right in downtown Bethesda it's easy to grab a slice and keep on walking.

Corner Slice is a Quick Place to go for Great NY Pizza!  This cool restaurant is a fun place to go with a simple menu and a dedicated staff.  Order from them by phone as they deliver too.  They have pizza and soft drinks, that's it!  They keep it simple and do it well.  Great Lunch Prices!  Thanks Corner Slice!  I've been there a few times and had good experiences.  The last time, I called on the phone and it was ready when I arrived.  They have three areas to eat at and plenty of napkins when I go there.  They have a TV, which one reviewer was boycotting because of the news channel, but that's silly!  My only "beef", so to speak, is that they need to fix the bathroom lock, fix the pacman machine, and leave the TV on the same channel when customers are watching it!  It is directed at us, not the staff.  I was interested in a news story but they muted the thing.  Don't get me wrong though, it's a cool place to go and it will meet your expectations for a mid-day pizza take out.  Enjoy Corner Slice!, Ben
Good pizza, small dining space. 2 for $8 slices and a drink is just right. Big large slices, NY style.
Great pizza
Awesome thin crust non-fancy pizza. And the large pies are HUGE!

Hand's down the best thin crust pizza I've had this far south of the big city.  I don't know how they do it but every bite into the crust 'crunches'.  I love their veggie pies, all of the toppings are always fresh, and you can never go wrong with the pepperoni.  I think a slice is four bucks and some change.  They have a 2 slice special with drink for close to $7.  Every time I come to this area in Bethesda I have to stop and get me a slice, no matter what.  I do agree, I wish they stayed open a little later on the weekend.  Overall you can't go wrong with any slice of pizza here.  The staff is always courteous and friendly. I've gotten several friends and coworkers hooked on their pizza.
Definitely the best and most authentic New York pizza around, but you'd better come when they're busy or get a whole pie if you want it really fresh.
Legitimate NY Style Pizza. I only wish they were open later on Fridays and Saturdays.
